name: EURING Code 2020 (Official SKOS)
description: Official EURING 2020 code based on SKOS thesaurus with precise field definitions

field_definitions.name: identification_number
field_definitions.description: Ring identification number - sequence of ten characters, padded with dots if needed
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Unique ring identifier for the bird throughout its life
field_definitions.editorial_note: Dots inserted to left of rightmost numbers. Use '-' for unknown/worn parts. Always use original ring number.

field_definitions.name: ringing_scheme
field_definitions.description: Ringing scheme code identifying the issuing center
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Identification of ringing scheme or country
field_definitions.editorial_note: Centers issuing rings with alphanumeric numbers that could be confused without address

field_definitions.name: primary_identification_method
field_definitions.description: Primary method used to identify the bird
field_definitions.editorial_note: A0=Metal ring (most common). Same method used throughout bird's life. Changes to A0 if metal ring added later.

field_definitions.name: metal_ring_information
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Status of metal ring on the bird
field_definitions.editorial_note: 0=not present, 1=added on tarsus/above, 2=added on tarsus, 3=added above tarsus, 4=already present, 5=changed, 6=removed, 7=extra ring added

field_definitions.name: other_marks_information
field_definitions.description: Information about marks other than conventional metal ring
field_definitions.editorial_note: ZZ=no other marks. First char=mark type, second=status. Special cases: OM/OP/OT/MM for multiple marks.

field_definitions.name: species_as_mentioned_by_finder
field_definitions.description: Species code as reported by the finder
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Species identification by person who found/handled bird
field_definitions.editorial_note: Based on Voous numbering system. May be incorrect identification by finder.

field_definitions.name: species_as_mentioned_by_scheme
field_definitions.description: Species code as concluded by the ringing scheme
field_definitions.editorial_note: Scheme's verification of species. Same for all records of particular bird. Based on IOC taxonomy.

field_definitions.name: age_mentioned_by_the_person
field_definitions.description: Age as mentioned by person who handled the bird
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Age classification based on plumage state
field_definitions.editorial_note: Statement about plumage, not actual age in years. Odd=exact year determinable, even=year not exact. Changes Dec 31-Jan 1.

field_definitions.name: sex_mentioned_by_the_person
field_definitions.description: Sex as mentioned by person who handled the bird

field_definitions.name: sex_concluded_by_the_scheme
field_definitions.description: Sex as concluded by the ringing scheme

field_definitions.name: manipulated
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Type of manipulation performed on bird
field_definitions.editorial_note: Priority order: H=hand reared(1), K=fledging provoked(2), C=captive >24h(3), F=transported from(4), T=transported to(5), M=manipulated(6), R=ringing accident(7), E=euthanised(8), P=poor condition(9), N=normal(10), U=unknown(11)

field_definitions.name: moved_before
field_definitions.editorial_note: 0=not moved, 2=moved unintentionally, 4=moved intentionally by man, 6=moved by water, 9=unknown

field_definitions.name: catching_method
field_definitions.description: Method used for catching the bird
field_definitions.editorial_note: M=mist net, N=on nest, H=by hand, A=actively triggered trap, etc. -=not applicable (found dead/shot)

field_definitions.name: catching_lures
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Type of lure used in capture
field_definitions.editorial_note: A=food, B=water, C=light, D=decoy birds alive, E=decoy birds stuffed, F=playback same species, G=playback other species, H=mechanical whistle, M=more than one, N=definitely no lure, U=unknown, -=not applicable

field_definitions.name: verification_of_the_metal_ring
field_definitions.description: Verification status of the metal ring
field_definitions.semantic_meaning: Whether ring was verified by scheme
field_definitions.editorial_note: 0=not verified, 1=verified by scheme, 9=unknown. Verification by ring sent, photo, photocopy, rubbing, or carbon copy.

validation_rules.rule_expression: len(value) == 10 and all(c.isalnum() or c in '.-' for c in value)
validation_rules.error_message: Identification number must be exactly 10 characters (letters, numbers, dots, dashes)
Ringing scheme must be a valid 3-letter code
Primary identification method must be letter + digit (e.g., A0)

validation_rules.rule_expression: len(value) == 2 and all(c.isalpha() or c == '-' for c in value)
validation_rules.error_message: Other marks information must be 2 alphabetic characters or dashes
Species code must be exactly 5 digits
Species code must be exactly 5 digits
Age code must be 0-9 or A-H
Sex code must be M, F, or U
Sex code must be M, F, or U
Manipulation code must be one of: N, H, K, C, F, T, M, R, E, P, U
Moved before code must be 0, 2, 4, 6, or 9
Catching method must be a valid single character code
Catching lures must be a valid single character code

format_specification.description: Official EURING 2020 format based on SKOS thesaurus

parsing_instructions.notes: This is the official EURING 2020 format based on SKOS thesaurus. Note that coordinates and measurements are not included in this core format.

skos_source.creator: https://orcid.org/0009-0002-5317-8809
skos_source.description: Based on official SKOS thesaurus for EURING scientific bird ringing data coding and exchange
